product_name: florence by millsClear Canvas Milky Oil Cleansing Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganYour skin becomes the main show with florence by mills' 3-phase Clear Canvas Milky Oil Cleansing Balm. The magic of this formula creates a balm that transforms into an oil and rinses away as a creamy milk, melting impurities, SPF, and long-wearing makeup. Ceramides leave skin soft and comfortable.
details: DetailsBenefitsTransformative 3-phase formulaEffortless makeup removal‚ÄãLeaves skin soft & supple‚ÄãConvenient & mess-free‚ÄãOn make-up free days, use to remove impurities on the skin & sunscreenKey IngredientsMarula oil helps break up & melt longwearing makeup ‚ÄãCeramides & triglycerides replenishes skinVitamin E supplements skin with antioxidants ‚ÄãItem 2630198How To UseMassage balm into dry skin. For eye makeup removal, apply to closed eyelids. Rinse thoroughly.Enjoying a day in the sun? Try Cleansing Balm on your body to remove all SPF from the skin, as a pre shower cleanse before water. Follow with soap/shower gel.IngredientsCaprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate, Water (Aqua/Eau), Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate, Polyglyceryl-6 Laurate, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearyl Alcohol, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ceramide NP, Linalool, Limonene.
how_to_use: Massage balm into dry skin. For eye makeup removal, apply to closed eyelids. Rinse thoroughly.Enjoying a day in the sun? Try Cleansing Balm on your body to remove all SPF from the skin, as a pre shower cleanse before water. Follow with soap/shower gel.

reviews.headline: No blurry vision!
reviews.comments: I love this cleansing balm! It's the only makeup remover that does not get into my eyes and cause everything to look blurry for the next half hour. It works really well in combination with a microfiber cloth and removes all of my mascara and eyeliner. It has a nice herbal scent that washes away with the product, so you only smell it while using it (which I prefer since I have slightly sensitive skin). Overall this is a nice solid first step in a double cleanse.

reviews.headline: Way Too Greasy
reviews.comments: I love a lot of Florence products and bought this hoping to be able to skip a step in my routine. I don't have a problem with the packaging, I think being able to squeeze it on your hands or cotton pad is convenient and had no issues. My main issue is that the product is SO greasy! It makes my face feel oily instantly and it does not wash off easily. You are left with a thick, oily residue on your face and you are just wiping around your makeup or sunscreen making it worse and harder to remove from the eyes and other areas. I have to use several cotton pads/squares and then add in some micellar water and it takes way too long to remove. So definitely did not save on time and actually added a step. If using in the shower maybe it would be easier, but that's not what I was looking for. Clean-it and other products offer the same results without that heavy greasy feeling like vasoline on your face. I would not recommend.

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: Love the feel and the way this cleanser smells. Gentle on skin and dissolves makeup easily!  Definitely will buy this face wash again.

reviews.headline: Good product- bad packaging
reviews.comments: Product is great but the top of it busted open the first time I used it. Probably won't repurchase because of this

reviews.headline: #FLORENCEPANEL
reviews.comments: I received a free sample from #florence panel and i am going to leave an honest review. I think its great and removes makeup well but it has an vasaline texture. Make sure to rinse it off all the way so it doesn't clog your pores. üíú

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: | was provided a free sample as part of the #florencepanel by fIroence by mills to try Clear Canvas. I love it, it has helped to clear up my complexion greatly! It does not feel heavy or harsh when I put it on.  Must try for sure! #florencepanel

reviews.headline: #florencepanel in love
reviews.comments:
I recently tried the Cleansing Balm, and it has been a game-changer for my routine! This product is incredibly effective at removing makeup and impurities without stripping my skin of its natural oils. The balm-to-oil texture melts away even the most stubborn waterproof makeup effortlessly.
What I LOVE most about this cleansing balm is how gentle it is on my skin. It leaves my face feeling soft, hydrated, and perfectly prepped for the next steps in my skincare regimen.
Plus, the subtle, pleasant scent adds a touch of spa-like relaxation to my evening routine. Overall, the Clear Canvas Milky Oil Cleansing Balm is a must-have for anyone looking for a thorough yet gentle cleansing experience. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: I love the clear canvas milky oil cleansing balm!üíúüê≥
reviews.comments: This product took off my makeup so good and left my skin feeling so soft!

reviews.headline: Is very oily
reviews.comments: I was a part of #florencepanel and received this product in exchange for an honest review. What you need to know about this product is it really is exactly what it says ‚Äî oily. I applied it to my skin and knew instantly that the oily parts of my skin were going to get clogged up. Make sure you really rinse all the product off to avoid breakouts.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: I was provided free sample as part of the florencepanel. It was cleansing and soft to my face. I'd highly recommend this product.

reviews.headline: AMAZING!!!
reviews.comments: I was provided a free sample as part of the #florencepanel by flroence mills to try the product and leave an honest review. This product seriously changed my skincare routine! I cannot recommend this cleansing balm enough, it is so silky and soft, it seriously makes your skin sparkly soft. 11/10 recommend! Thanks Mills!

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: This product is really good for taking makeup off at the end of a long day! It leaves your skin super soft! I love all if the flornece by mills products that i have used and have never had issues! Thank you so much #florencepanel for choosing me to try this product! I was provided a free sample as part of the #florencepanel by florence by mills to try the product and write an honest review.

reviews.headline: NEED!
reviews.comments: I received a free sample in part of the #florencepanel and I was not disappointed!  The smooth texture on dry skin that washed off like such a dream! Worth the purchase!!

reviews.headline: Gentle scent
reviews.comments: I was provided a free sample by the #florencepanel. This isn't your typical face soap. It doesn't lather up but instead goes on like a gel and gently cleans your face with slight foaming. There is a very sweet but subtle scent.  Works great!!

reviews.headline: I would definitely by this Product
reviews.comments: I received a free sample this product as part of #Florencepanel from Florence by mills for an honest review. first the product is really thick like a lotion. the scent was nice and not overpowering. I liked how it took off all my make up without making my face feel dry. It made my face soft and glowy. It didn't irritate my sensitive skin or cause acne brake outs. I used it to also remove eye makeup and it didn't irritate my eyes.

reviews.headline: Look NO further for your face
reviews.comments: It goes on with this oddly satisfying oily texture and applies to the skin like a dream. And washing it off? You would never know it was oily because it comes off easily leaving the skin feeling absolutely amazing. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: effective and nice.
reviews.comments: I got this product free sample as a part of #florencepanel by Florence of mills. I love this cleansing balm. It starts with a gel texture and that's the part I love most. ingredient are really awesome and besides being effective for removing makeup didirt and impurities it's super awesome that it leaves my skin soft l, supple and glowy. Vitamin E and ceramides are really great for keeping skin hydrated and protecting skin from damage by harsh free radicle. Definitely recommended.

reviews.headline: Amazing product!
reviews.comments: I was given a free sample as part of the #florencepanel, i used it to take off a full face of makeup and it was amazing!! Took off all of my skin tint, mascara , black eyeliner, concealer, blush, eyebrow tint , EVERYTHING!! It didn't dry my skin out at all and left my skin incredibly clean and smooth. Will absolutely be adding this to my skincare routine!

reviews.headline: Recommend 1000/10
reviews.comments: I was gifted this product as a #florencepanel to write an honest review. I really liked this product ever since i started using it as my daily makeup remover. It removes the entire makeup in just 1-2 washed (depends how much makeup u wear) 10/10üíóüíó

reviews.headline: PERFECT FOR OILY SKIN!
reviews.comments:
I have always been in the hunt for an oil cleansing balm that won't clog my pores. Florence kindly gifted me this cleansing balm and has truly been so amazing on my skin. Not only does it take all of my makeup, it also does not strip my skin of moisture
#florencepanel

faceoff_positive.comments: First and foremost to disclose I was given this product to be part of the Fall #FlorencePanel. That being said this is my first time being sent a free product to try and based off of what I have seen I was really anxious. My skin is very temperamental combination skin. I previously have used CeraVe after about a decade of not having anything work. It worked but in the last year I wanted to try something else. I currently use the rose water spray and the clear the way products by Florence By Mills. That being said this is all new for me but I adore it. More importantly the Clear Canvas Milky Oil Cleansing Balm. It not only leaves my skin feeling hydrated and refreshed but does not leave me with a dry feeling after or an oily one  which I often have no matter what product I use. The only downside is I am not the biggest fan of not having caps since I share a bathroom with my husband and he has his own skin care and we are avid tattoo getters so we sometimes have peelies on our counter from healing tattoos. But the product itself was fantastic, it also resulted in my skin feeling softer and generally less irritated. I have also been struggling with clearing one side of my face and within three days my skin had cleared up with this product. ON TOP OF ALL OF THIS. It removed my work makeup and costuming makeup incredibly well. I would say absolutely try it if you struggle with skin care like I do. Also, it smells absolutely INCREDIBLE.
faceoff_positive.headline: LOVED THIS PRODUCT #FlorencePanel

faceoff_negative.comments: I love a lot of Florence products and bought this hoping to be able to skip a step in my routine. It makes my face feel oily instantly and it does not wash off easily. You are left with a thick, oily residue on your face and you are just wiping around your makeup or sunscreen making it worse and harder to remove from the eyes and other areas.
